item.description: Java 一、基础 1、helloworld public class Hello { public static void main(String[] args) { System.out.println("Hello, world!"); } } [root@Sugar j1]🐳 java Hello.java Hello, world! 2、变量定义 int n = 100; n = 200; // 变量n赋值为200 int i2 = -2147483648; int i3 =

item.title: Java
item.author: serialt
item.description: Java 1、Hello world java 的包名需要和目录一致，类名需要与文件名一致 [sugar@Sugar java]🐳 tree . . └── Hello └── HelloWorld.java 1 directory, 1 file HelloWorld.java package Hello; public class HelloWorld { public static void main(String[] args) { System.out.println("hello,world"); } } [sugar@Sugar
